> [!IMPORTANT]
> **Notice: Documentation Contributions**
> Thank you for your interest in Moneybird. This repository is used for our documentation, which is automatically generated and updated via an internal build system.
> 
> Because changes are managed through this internal process, we do not accept Pull Requests directly on this repository. Please note that any PR opened by external contributors will be closed.
> 
> We value your feedback! If you have suggestions or improvements for the documentation, please reach out to us at **support@moneybird.com**. We will take your input into consideration and update the specification accordingly.

---

## Description
